duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform occupational health care activities, including health and wellness training and education, employee health services, and compliance.
Support OSHA-required record keeping and determine employee restrictions and return to work eligibility.
Develop, formulate, and implement plans of care based on standard order and medical directives.
Treat, evaluate, and assess employee illness or injury and determine medical direction.
Conduct safety and ergonomic training and administer drug and alcohol programs.
Assist in designing and executing employee health and wellness programs.
Handle basic issues and problems under direct supervision, while escalating more complex issues to appropriate staff.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related field or equivalent experience
